ValidationRule.description: This will prevent a Property from being updated to Pending Status if certain data points are missing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Pending'), NOT ( $Profile.Name= "System Administrator"), OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Ground Up'), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Bridge')), OR( ISBLANK(BPO_Appraisal_Firm__c), ISBLANK(BPO_Appraisal_Order_Date__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Valuation_Type__c)), ISBLANK(BPO_Appraisal_Date__c), ISBLANK(Appraised_Value_Amount__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Refinance_Acquisition__c)), ISBLANK( APN__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Several fields are required before updating the Status to Pending. Please verify these fields are populated: Appraised As Is Value, Appraisal Firm, Appraisal Fee, Appraisal Order Date, Appraisal Date, Refinance Acquisition, Valuation Type, APN.
